QuestData.Title: Warming Up
QuestData.Description:
Prepare yourself, $n. We're nearing the island where the previous expedition was lost.
Warm up on these combat dummies. We need everyone ready for whatever we find on that island.
QuestData.LogDescription: Warm up by fighting a Combat Dummy.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't be shy. Just walk up to the target dummies, select them, and use your main attack.
QuestData.RewardText:
Good, looks like you've kept up your $c training during our voyage.
I'm concerned about the sudden turn in weather. Spar with Private Cole while I speak with the ship's crew.
Cole's report will determine where we'll place you on our initial expedition team.

Objectives.Objective: Practice combat on a Combat Dummy
